title: 5.2 Master Challenge 2
question: Design and code an app on Thunkable to display information about yourself.The app may display details such as your name, age, date of birth, hobbies and favorite quote. The information has to be displayed on the click of a button. Make your app look as attractive as possible.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
